snippet: San Francisco 49ers cornerback Jimmie Ward is week-to-week with a quad strain, the team announced Tuesday. He left Sunday's loss to the Seahawks with the non-contact injury after covering a kickoff in the second quarter....
lead_paragraph: San Francisco 49ers cornerback Jimmie Ward is week-to-week with a quad strain, the team announced Tuesday. He left Sunday's loss to the Seahawks with the non-contact injury after covering a kickoff in the second quarter.

headline.main: 49ers Looking for Replacements for Cornerback Jimmie Ward
headline.print_headline: 49ers Looking for Replacements for Cornerback Jimmie Ward
